query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Drop DoS Test Table
query.description: Ensures clean state by dropping table from any previous failed run

query.name: Create DoS Test Table
query.description: Creates table for Denial of Service testing with indexes
query.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dos_test_table (id INT SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, query_data VARCHAR(255), query_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX idx_query_time (query_time))

query.name: Insert Initial Test Data
query.description: Insert 10000 initial records for DoS testing
query.query: INSERT INTO dos_test_table (query_data) VALUES (CONCAT('DoS Test Data ', gen_random_uuid()::text))

query.name: Baseline Hour 1 - 1001 Queries
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)

query.name: Baseline Hour 2 - 1001 Queries
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)

query.name: Baseline Hour 3 - 1001 Queries
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)

query.name: Baseline Hour 4 - 1001 Queries
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive DoS Attack
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 205000 rapid queries - 200x normal rate indicating Denial of Service attack
query.query: SELECT * FROM dos_test_table WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RANDOMOM() * 10000) LIMIT 1

query.name: Verify DoS Pattern
query.description: Verify table statistics after DoS attack
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, MIN(id) as min_id, MAX(id) as max_id FROM dos_test_table
